posts.original_author_title: Explainability Lead at MIT-IBM Lab, Senior Research Scientist at IBM
posts.content: It's on! In its 8th year, the original VISxAI workshop wants your contributions for explaining ML/AI/GenAI principles. Please consider to submit. Deadline: July 30 webpage: https://visxai.io/

posts.author: Kenza Amara
posts.title: ConceptX: Concept-Level Explainability for Auditing & Steering LLM Responses
posts.content: ðŸ§  Why did your LLM say that? And more importantly, how can you change its answer? We present ConceptX: a concept-level attribution method for understanding and guiding LLMs.

posts.author: Kenza Amara
posts.title: Challenges and Opportunities of Text Generation Explainability
posts.content: ðŸš€ New paper outlining 17 key challenges for text generation explainability and strategies for involving multiple stakeholders. Co-authors: Rita Sevastjanova, Mennatallah El-Assady.
I'm looking forward to speaking at the United Nations #AIforGood summit on the LLM Inspection toolkit by ETH IVIA Lab. Join us for the XAI for LLM session tomorrow.
